text: int main ( ) { int i , n , length = 0 , a [ 100 ] , t , total , flag = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d\n" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } a [ n ] = a [ n - 1 ] - 1 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) flag = 1 ; else { if ( flag == 1 ) length ++ ; flag = 0 ; } } total = n + length ; printf ( "%d" , total ) ; } return 0 ; }
